about.whatIsIt: Privacy Search Companion - simple browser extension that will allow you to direct your request to one of the search engines that are focused on privacy and confidentiality.
about.aboutAdsInIt: Also, when you query in the presented search engines, you will be given only what you are search, without advertising and promotions. The developers of these systems do not seek to make money on you and your requests.

description.whatThisExtensionDoing: The extension embeds buttons on the page with search results that will allow you to open this query in another search engine in a matter of seconds
description.aboutConfidential: The extension does not store your requests in any way and does not analyze them in any way, all code actions occur on your side.
description.howToUse: The extension has a simple Popup where you can get acquainted with the developers, as well as customize the extension a bit, for example, permanently hide the buttons. This can also be done near the buttons by clicking on the eye.
